thread.section_title: LightInTheBox 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 LightInTheBox 的点评意见 | www.lightinthebox.com
thread.title: M. Dillen
thread.title_full: LightInTheBox 的点评人 M. Dillen

author: M. Dillen
title: M. Dillen
text:
"All items are no longer available" a month later, I received this message. Money is left for next buying ?
but I want my money back! I do not have a good experience. And hope they will still be honest. Let's not take months to pay back the money in my account. A moment and speak to an ombuds. But know .... Never again !!!
